title: Horse (Pferd) and Stag's Head (Hirschkopf) (in-text plates, page 27) from Tierfabeln des Aesop (Aesop's Fables)
medium: Two from an illustrated book with thirty-five woodcuts (including woodcut cover, title page and ornamental initials)
dimensions: composition (horse, irreg.): 1 9/16 x 1 5/8" (3.9 x 4.2 cm); composition (stag, irreg.): 1 9/16 x 3 7/16" (4 x 8.8 cm); page: 13 x 9 1/16" (33 x 23 cm)
